resources.string: This application enables synchronisation of DND toggle from the Wear 2.0 watch to the Mobile phone.\nSynchronisation from Phone to Wearable is currently not possible due to Wear 2.0 security restrictions.

It seems that you have an LG phone. If button above throws an error, you will need to grant access to all notification permissions. This is a known issue in LG operating system. More info can be found here.
